title: Coconut Almond Chia Seed Pudding
full_text:
Coconut Almond Chia Seed Pudding
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Soaking Time
2 hrs
Total
2 hrs 5 mins
Serves
2
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
vanilla almond milk
1/2
cup
chia seeds
1/4
cup
sweetened shredded coconut
1/4
cup
toasted
slivered almonds
4
teaspoons
sugar
, divided, optional
Directions
In a medium bowl, stir together almond milk and chia seeds. Add coconut and slivered almonds and stir well until combined. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Before serving, stir pudding again. Divide between bowls and top each with a 1 teaspoon of sugar if desired.
